meanings.definition: The practice of combining different metals to create a new alloy.
meanings.sent1: Symmetallisms can result in stronger and more durable materials.
meanings.sent2: The symmetallisms in this industry have led to groundbreaking advancements in metalworking.

meanings.sent5: The symmetallisms of blending metals together were like a harmonious dance of elements.

meanings.definition: The study or theory of the properties of alloys.
meanings.sent1: Understanding symmetallisms helps scientists predict the behavior of different alloys.

meanings.sent3: The symmetallisms class was so fascinating that even the students who disliked chemistry found it interesting.

meanings.sent2: The symmetallisms in construction have made buildings more resistant to harsh weather conditions.
